conbody.p: is a set of open-source tools that support technical writers and information architects working with and creating specialized semantic DITA frameworks.
The plug-ins that come with integrate well with and the DITA Open Toolkit (DITA-OT) to support authoring and publishing.
offers a strong author guidance as well as automated consistency and plausibility checks. can help you and your authors with the following tasks:

li.p: Integrating external structured data into DITA files
Extracting DITA content to structured data files
Automating the generation of texts (DITA to DITA) and figures (DITA to SVG)
